directions: Mix green onions, soy sauce, sesame seeds, Korean red pepper powder, sugar, and sesame oil together in a bowl until evenly combined.
Place rice in a serving bowl. Toss lettuce and cucumber together and place onto rice. Arrange tofu over lettuce and cucumber. Drizzle sesame mixture over tofu to taste.
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons Korean chile pepper powder, or to taste
1/2 head of romaine lettuce (heart only), torn into bite-size pieces
title: Spicy Tofu Salad Bowl
